title: Golden Globes 2016 red carpet welcomes Melissa McCarthy and her shrinking frame
title_page: Golden Globes 2016 red carpet welcomes Melissa McCarthy and her shrinking frame | Daily Mail Online
text:
Melissa McCarthy had her newly svelte body on display in an inky black gown on Sunday at the Golden Globe Awards.
The 45-year-old actress has lost more than 50 pounds in the past year and showed off her new figure in the floor length gown with a plunging neckline and front leg slit.
McCarthy was nominated in the Best Performance by an Actress in a Musical or Comedy for her portrayal of Susan Cooper in Spy.
Scroll down for video
On a roll: Melissa McCarthy had her trimmed down figure on display in an inky black gown on Sunday at the Golden Globe Awards in Beverly Hills, California
The action spy comedy written and directed by Paul Feig also was nominated in the Best Motion Picture - Musical or Comedy category.
McCarthy during a red carpet interview told E! that the Golden Globes 'was my favourite one' among the Hollywood awards shows.
'It's like a wedding where I get to see everyone,' McCarthy said upon arriving at the awards ceremony held at the The Beverly Hilton Hotel in Beverly Hills, California.
See live updates on the Golden Globes 2016 with more of the latest red carpet pictures
Spy star: The actress was nominated for her portrayal of Susan Cooper in Spy
Slimmed down: Melissa's weight loss since the Oscars in February 2012 was clearly evident
She also revealed that she'd be open to a Spy franchise.
'It's certainly a character I loved, I would go back to her in a minute, but we'll see. I have no idea,' McCarthy said.
McCarthy was escorted to the awards ceremony by her 42-year-old actor husband Ben Falcone.
Husband and wife: Ben Falcone escorted his wife to the awards ceremony
Falcone had a minor role in Spy portraying an American Tourist and has been in minor roles in several of McCarthy's films including Bridesmaids and Identity Thief.
He posted a photo on Twitter earlier on Sunday showing him and Melissa headed to the awards ceremony.
'Heading to the @goldenglobes with the lovely @melissamccarthy - we're single and ready to mingle! Wait...,'
Funny couple: The actor and director shared a Twitter picture of him and Melissa headed to the ceremony and wrote 'we're single and ready to mingle! Wait...'
I'm not sure Ben knows what that saying means, but Ashley Madison did sponsor his tux. https://t.co/VUMWZz5HT9 â€” Melissa McCarthy (@melissamccarthy) January 10, 2016
McCarthy and Falcone have been married since October 2005 and have two daughters together.
Feig also directed McCarthy in the upcoming Ghostbusters reboot due out in July that also stars Kristen Wiig, Kate McKinnon and Leslie Jones.
McCarthy earlier this month won the People's Choice Awards for Favorite Comedic Movie Actress and Favorite Comedic TV Actress for her work on Mike And Molly.
Coming soon: Melissa also teamed up with Paul Feig for the upcoming Ghostbusters reboot due out in July
